title: Bloomberg Markets: Scheer Doesn't Fear Black Swan Event
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Scheer Doesn't Fear Black Swan Event
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Karl Scheer Chief Investment Officer University of Cincinnati Discussing that his better-than-average endowments retunrs are part of a long-term strategy and why he is not concnered about a possible June black swan event, as has happened in the last two years with the Greek debt crisis of 2015 and last year's Brexit news. Bloomberg News Higher Education Reporter Janet Lorin also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
